title: What actually human life actually wants to achieve, what is the soul purpose of it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Soul purpose of every creature and human beings is to evolve in its highest state of being, right now we are the most intelligent species on the planet, but still we are not able to evolve in our essence what we actually are, i mean spiritual growth should happen without this you cannot be said to be a evolved being.
Fulfilment of the purpose of being born as a human being ! Otherwise our life has no meaning.
